org.epics.pvData.pv
Interface StatusCreate

public interface StatusCreate

Interface for creating status.

Author:
mse

Method Summary
 Status createStatus(Status.StatusType type, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
          Create status.
 Status deserializeStatus(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, DeserializableControl control)
          Deserialize status.
 Status getStatusOK()
          Get OK status.
 

Method Detail

getStatusOK

Status getStatusOK()
Get OK status. Static instance should be returned.

Returns:
OK Status instance.

createStatus

Status createStatus(Status.StatusType type,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.Throwable cause)
Create status.

Parameters:
type - status type, non-null.
message - message describing an error, non-null. NOTE: Do NOT use throwable.getMessage() as message, since it will be supplied with the cause.
cause - exception that caused an error. Optional.
Returns:
status instance.

deserializeStatus

Status deserializeStatus(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                         DeserializableControl control)
Deserialize status. NOTE: use this method instead of Status.deserialize(), since this allows OK status optimization.

Parameters:
buffer - deserialization buffer.
control - deserialization control.
Returns:
status instance.
